title: Alison Krauss - A Hundred Miles or More: A Collection (2007)
description:
A Hundred Miles or More: A Collection is comprised of 16 tracks, highlighting Alison Krauss&#039; career outside of her traditional releases with long time band Union Station. The album features Krauss&#039; collaboration with John Waite on the single "Missing You," as well as Krauss&#039; contributions to film soundtracks, including the OscarÃ‚Â® nominated songs "The Scarlet Tide" and "You Will Be My Ain True Love," written for the motion picture Cold Mountain and "Down to the River to Pray" from the film O Brother, Where Art Thou? Known for her collaborations, Krauss also includes several duets in the collection such as the 2003 hit with Brad Paisley, "Whiskey Lullaby," and her duet with James Taylor for the tribute album Livin&#039;, Lovin&#039;, Losin&#039;: Songs of The Louvin Brothers, "How&#039;s the World Treating You." The collection debuts five new songs - "You&#039;re Just a Country Boy," "Jacob&#039;s Dream," "Simple Love," "Lay Down Beside Me," and "Away Down the River," all of which feature Krauss as a producer.
